p.k: Chris Paul banked in a shot over Tim Duncan with a second left to lift the Los Angeles Clippers to a 111-109 victory over the defending NBA champion
Lou Williams, 36 points, led the Los Angeles Clippers to the largest postseason comeback in NBA history. Landry Shamet hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 16
Lou Williams hit a fadeaway jumper with 1:29 left and finished with 33 points and 10 assists, Golden State uncharacteristically clanked shots
Elton Brand had 30 points, 12 rebounds and five blocked shots, Corey Maggette came off the bench to score 13 of his 25 points in the fourth quarter

n.u: Celtics/Braves, 1976 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals - Game

p.n: Celtics/Braves, 1976 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals - Game 3
p.k: Bob McAdoo and Randy Smith combined for 53 points as the Buffalo Braves took down the Boston Celtics in Game 3 winning their first game in the series which stands at 2-1

n.u: Grizzlies/Spurs, 2011 NBA Western Conference First Round - Game

p.n: Grizzlies/Spurs, 2011 NBA Western Conference First Round - Game 1
p.k: Sixteen years after entering the NBA, the Grizzlies finally have a postseason win. Zach Randolph had 25 points and 14 rebounds, and Shane Battier
The Grizzlies knocked off the Thunder led by Zach Randolph with 28 points
Mike Conley returned eight days after facial surgery to score 22 points as the Memphis Grizzlies beat the Golden State Warriors, evening the Western
Zach Randolph scored 22 points and Marc Gasol added 21 points and 15 rebounds as the Grizzlies beat the Warriors 99-89 to take a 2-1 lead in their Western
Grizzlies C Marc Gasol hit a 12-foot floater with 0.7 seconds left in overtime, and the Grizzlies beat the Spurs 110-108 on Saturday night to even up their
Mike Conley scored 13 of Memphis 14 points in the second overtime session, Jaren Jackson Jr scored a career-high 36 points and the Grizzlies
Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 27 points and the Memphis Grizzlies ended a five-game losing streak with a 107-99 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers
The Grizzlies knocked off the Thunder led by Zach Randolph with 28 points
